sentences.en: By the sensation that chemical gas stimulates olfactory receptor and causes.
sentences.cn: 由化学气体刺激嗅觉感受器而引起的感觉.

sentences.en: Exposure may produce olfactory fatigue or habituation.
sentences.cn: 接触可以引起嗅觉疲劳或成瘾.

sentences.en: Human mind constantly depend on objects which are taken from visual, auditory, olfactory, gustatory and tactile means.
sentences.cn: 人的心理不断地依赖于从视觉，听觉，嗅觉，味觉和触觉得到的目标。

sentences.en: It's not just women who respond to such olfactory cues.
sentences.cn: 并非只有女性会对这种气味提示做出反应.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the pathogenesis of olfactory dysfunction caused by sinusitis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨鼻窦炎引起的嗅觉障碍的发病机制.

sentences.en: Repellency is not confined to the olfactory senses.
sentences.cn: 防护性不只限于嗅觉感官.

sentences.en: Sighthounds hunt by sight, Scenthounds by tracking with their superior olfactory senses.
sentences.cn: Sighthounds通过视力来发现猎物, Scenthounds通过她们超级灵敏的嗅觉追踪猎物.

sentences.en: The epidermal folds around their mouths collect molecules for olfactory analysis.
sentences.cn: 他们嘴周围的表皮褶皱能收集微粒分析气味.

sentences.en: the olfactory cells in the nose
The olfactory epithelium contains millions of olfactory receptor neurons.
sentences.cn: 嗅觉上皮细胞包含了几百万个嗅觉神经元.

sentences.en: The team estimates that the kakapo has 667 functional olfactory receptor genes.
sentences.cn: 据估计鸮鹉有667个起作用的嗅觉感受器.

sentences.en: This also produced a similar , but smaller reaction in the olfactory neurons.
sentences.cn: 他们还发现:逐渐降低无气味溶液喷入的压力, 嗅觉神经元的反应随之减弱.

sentences.en: This olfactory sense develops in the womb.
sentences.cn: 这一嗅觉在子宫内形成。

sentences.en: Thus 11 of 14 patients with anosmia ( 79 % ) achieved long - term olfactory rehabilitation.
sentences.cn: 因而,14例患者中的11例嗅觉丧失的患者获得 长期 的嗅觉恢复.

sentences.en: Whereas attractants, repellents, and many incitants are olfactory substances , stimulants, and deterrents are usually gustatory.
sentences.cn: 引诱剂, 排斥剂还是其他的兴奋剂都是嗅觉物质, 但刺激剂和阻抑剂常常是味觉物质.

trans.tran_en: connected with the sense of smell
